## Generate 2 square waves
```{bash}
../../bin/square wave.csv 1.0 1.0 0.0
../../bin/square window.csv 1.0 1.0 0.0
```

## The wave forms

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

library(ggpubr)
theme_set(theme_pubr())

sqwave<-read.csv("wave.csv",header=FALSE,sep=",")
names(sqwave)<-c("x","y")

winwave<-read.csv("window.csv",header=FALSE,sep=",")
names(winwave)<-c("x","y")

ggplot(sqwave,aes(x=x,y=y))+geom_line()
ggplot(winwave,aes(x=x,y=y))+geom_line()+xlim(0.0,2.0)

```
